This file previously defined a Markdown-based bug report issue template.
The repository now uses the form-based `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml`
as the single source of truth for bug report issues.

The YAML frontmatter and template content were intentionally removed so that
GitHub no longer treats this file as an active issue template and does not
show duplicate "Bug Report" options in the issue creation dropdown.
-->
